original_title: Hans Christian Andersen The Snow Queen Parts 1&2 and Other Stories
overview: A newly animated version about two best friends, Gerda and Kae. An evil spell is cast on Kae and he becomes mean and nasty to Gerda. He does not want to be with her and mysteriously disappears. Gerda sets out on a long and dangerous journey to find her best friend and bring him home. Along her search, Gerda is taken in by a witch, saved from freezing by a crow and guided by a reindeer to the Snow Queen's ice castle where Kae has been taken. Will Gerda be able to rescue Kae and save him from the spell? BONUS STORIES: The Snowman - The Jumper
title: Hans Christian Andersen The Snow Queen Parts 1&2 and Other Stories
